section.p: ‘I’ll vouch for this man,’ you tell the youths.
Grumbling, they slope off with sullen glances back at you. No doubt they’d like to beat you up as well, but they know you are a personal friend of the chancellor, Lord Kiyomori.

‘This country’s gone to the dogs, all right, when you get curs like that roaming the city in packs,’ ventures the old man shakily. He is a lord of the Wistaria Clan. You have made a useful friend today. Get the codeword Fuchsia and .
